function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to implement frequent handwashing and barrier measures","Impact":"Increased transmission of respiratory viruses and potential outbreaks","Mitigation":"Enforce strict protocols for hand hygiene and barrier measures, provide education and training on proper implementation","Technologies":"Hand sanitizers, protective gloves, gowns, and masks","People":"General public, healthcare workers, individuals in crowded settings","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare institutions, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of structured programme for instruction and education on public health measures","Impact":"Limited effectiveness of public health measures in reducing virus transmission","Mitigation":"Develop and implement a structured programme for public health education and instruction, provide resources for education and training","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, educational materials, public health campaigns","People":"General public, educational institutions, employers","Owner":"Public health organizations, educational institutions, employers"},{"Description":"Inadequate isolation of people with suspected respiratory tract infections","Impact":"Risk of spreading respiratory viruses to others in the community","Mitigation":"Implement clear guidelines for isolating individuals with respiratory tract infections, provide support for home isolation when necessary","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital health monitoring, isolation facilities","People":"General public, healthcare workers, individuals in home care settings","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare institutions, community organizations"}]}
